casebody.data:
FRANCE
v.
NC DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY 234P19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2019 Corey Eugene France, Taylorsville, For France, Corey Barry H. Bloch, Assistant Attorney General, For NC Department of Public Safety The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th of June 2019 by Plaintiff for Leave for Joinder of Appeals: "Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2019." Davis, J., recused
